skillTree.localised_description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
The eyes of the hawk, able to pluck a falling hair with a deft arrow sent from its bow.

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range

skillTree.localised_description: When Saytang leaps, the ground trembles …and his foes stumble and fall.

ui_effects.localised_text: Causes severe disruption to enemy formations

skillTree.localised_description: When you can step with ease between mountaintops, what need have you of wings?

ui_effects.localised_text: Causes severe disruption to enemy formations

skillTree.localised_description: It's the quiet ones you need to watch… and ne'er a truer word said!

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for Advanced Military buildings
	(local province)

Upkeep: -15% for Terracotta Sentinel, Jade Lion and Jet Lion units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Ever-silent, always watching, watching... Saytang is always ready to smite the foes of the Dragon Emperor from the map in defence of his people.
In spite of appearances, Saytang never sleeps, and is always alert to the dangers from without that come to destroy Cathay's precious Harmony.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -15%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Saytang fires volley after volley of arrows into the enemy lines, weakening their ability to defend against the stone giant when he reaches their ranks.
Forces close to Saytang in battle almost become an extension of his own colossal stone limbs, always ready to swarm and strike at the wave of his mighty hand.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain: +15% for Jade Lion and Jet Lion units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Expert Charge Defence for Terracotta Sentinel units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: One of the myriad advantages of Constructs is their ability to see the threat coming from leagues away, enabling an effective defence to be mounted in relatively short order.

skillTree.localised_description: Magical ammunition isn't subject to quite the same restrictions as its solid equivalent, except when the Winds blow weaker across the field of battle.

Base missile damage: +5% for Cathayan bow units
	(Hero's army)

Base missile damage: +10% for Cathayan bow units
	(Hero's army)

Base missile damage: +15% for Cathayan bow units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This paragon of Cathayan Constructs imbues others of his kind with greater resilience, be they jade, jet, stone or flesh.

effects.description:

	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +10% for Jade Lion, Jet Lion and Celestial Lion units

	(Hero's army)

	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Terracotta Sentinel units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +30% for Jade Lion, Jet Lion and Celestial Lion units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: By whichever sneaky, underhanded means the foe chooses to enter Cathay, they will find Saytang and his friends waiting for them, and absolutely ready to do battle.

effects.description:
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +15%
	(accompanying Lord)

Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +25%
	(accompanying Lord)

Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +40%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Advanced archery techniques such as this may trick the foe into making a fatal error, one which will turn them into screaming, fleshy pincushions as a result!

Reload time reduction: +10% for Cathayan bow units

skillTree.localised_description: Near… far… In fact, wherever it is that you are, Saytang's belittling gaze will find you.

attributes.bullet_text:
This unit is permanently visible to the enemy, regardless of line of sight.
	
	Revealed units are not affected by the following attributes:
	 Hide Forest
	 Stalk
	 Unspottable

skillTree.localised_description: What is that up in the sky? It is death, plain and simple; death for Cathay's mortal enemies, and an inspiration to its loyal warriors.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.
What use armour, or even magical defences, against such powerful ordnance?
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
When fire hangs in the sky above the battlefield, death is sure to rain down upon it.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Sky Lantern, Sky-junk, Onyx Crowmen, Celestial Lion and Great Moon Bird units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +4% for Onyx Crowmen, Celestial Lion and Great Moon Bird units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +10% for Sky Lantern, Sky-junk, Onyx Crowmen, Celestial Lion and Great Moon Bird units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Onyx Crowmen, Celestial Lion and Great Moon Bird units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for Sky Lantern, Sky-junk, Onyx Crowmen, Celestial Lion and Great Moon Bird units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Onyx Crowmen, Celestial Lion and Great Moon Bird units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This enchanted stone statue is imbued with arcane abilities, as are others of its kind.
Saytang does not need a quiver, for he has the Winds of Magic from which to draw, with all their eldritch power.
Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.
The giant, stone Construct known as Saytang can simply leap from peak to peak, far above the abundant valleys he is bound to defend.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

Constructs cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Constructs also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Constructs may also have their hit points restored and stats boosted by special characters such as the Tomb Kings Necrotect.

items.colour_text: A single, enchanted shot is all that Saytang needs.

ui_effects.localised_text: Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ever vigilant, always watching; from the highest peaks in Cathay, Saytang's arrows whistle on the wind, foreshadowing the deaths of those who threaten the Silk Lands.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
	(enemy characters in region)

Armour: +8 for Terracotta Sentinel units
	(Hero's army)
